mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_order (orderId, rid,orderName, orderSummary, userId, orderNum, orderNo, orderStatus, payType, invoiceType, invoice, payPepole,orderTime) VALUES (null, #{rid}, #{orderName},#{orderSummary}, #{userId},#{orderNum}, #{orderNo}, #{orderStatus}, #{payType}, #{invoiceType}, #{invoice}, #{payPepole},#{orderTime})
mapper.select: SELECT orderId, rid,orderName, orderSummary, userId, orderNum, orderNo, orderStatus, payType, invoiceType, invoice,userId payPepole,orderTime FROM user_order WHERE orderNo=#{orderNo}
mapper.update: update user_order set rid=#{rid}, orderName=#{orderName}, orderSummary=#{orderSummary}, orderNum=#{orderNum}, orderStatus=#{orderStatus}, payType=#{payType}, invoiceType=#{invoiceType}, invoice=#{invoice}, payPepole=#{payPepole}, orderTime=NOW() where orderId=#{orderId} and orderNo=#{orderNo} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: select uo.orderId, uo.userId,uo.orderNo, uo.orderTime,ui.consignee, (select value from sys_code where code=uo.orderStatus and type='orderStatus')orderStatus , uo.orderSummary,uo.payPepole FROM user_order uo left join receiver_info ui on uo.rid=ui.rid WHERE uo.userId=#{userId} and uo.orderStatus!='0' LIMIT #{startnum},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from( select uo.orderId, uo.userId,uo.orderNo, ui.userName,uo.orderTime,ui.consignee, uo.orderStatus, uo.orderSummary,uo.payPepole FROM user_order uo left join user_info ui on uo.rid=ui.rid WHERE uo.userId=#{userId} and uo.orderStatus!='0') a

select uo.orderId, uo.userId,uo.orderNo, uo.orderTime,ui.consignee, uo.orderStatus, uo.orderSummary,uo.payPepole FROM user_order uo left join receiver_info ui on uo.rid=ui.rid WHERE uo.userId=#{userId} and uo.orderStatus!='0' and ${whereSql} LIMIT #{startnum},#{pageSize}

select count(1) from( select uo.orderId, uo.userId,uo.orderNo, uo.orderTime,ui.consignee, uo.orderStatus, uo.orderSummary,uo.payPepole FROM user_order uo left join receiver_info ui on uo.rid=ui.rid WHERE uo.userId=#{userId} and uo.orderStatus!='0' and ${whereSql} ) a
